A non-interactive scene that can be skipped. A cutscene is a non-interactive scene within the game (e.g., a video, a conversation, an automated sequence). The player can usually skip them pressing some button.

An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.

A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.
A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.

A game screen where a concrete game task is developed. Games are usually composed by a set of screens the player navigates. A screen has a concrete function within the game. A screen contains a menu, or the gameplay. To define virtual zones inside the game world, it is recommended to use area or zone.

description.en-US: An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: ¡Guay! ¡Yo me apunto! ¿Y tú qué, das? Puedes aprovechar y hablar con la gente de clase.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: ¡Guay! ¡Yo me apunto! ¿Y tú qué, das? Puedes aprovechar y hablar con la gente de clase.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Paula
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Es que el finde que viene celebro mi cumple en mi casa y me han dicho mis padres que puedo invitaros a todos. ¿Qué os parece?

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Paula
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Es que el finde que viene celebro mi cumple en mi casa y me han dicho mis padres que puedo invitaros a todos. ¿Qué os parece?

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: ¿Qué tal, Paula? ¿Por qué nos buscabas?

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: ¿Qué tal, Paula? ¿Por qué nos buscabas?
¡Hola Laura, hola das! Os estaba buscando.
¡Hola Laura, hola das! Os estaba buscando.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Me alegro por ti. Mudarse a otra ciudad y cambiarse de instituto tiene que ser un rollo...

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Me alegro por ti. Mudarse a otra ciudad y cambiarse de instituto tiene que ser un rollo...

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Tú
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Pues... la verdad es que todavía no he hablado mucho con nuestros compañeros, pero he conocido a una chica de otro instituto de la ciudad y llevamos unos cuántos días hablando.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Tú
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Pues... la verdad es que todavía no he hablado mucho con nuestros compañeros, pero he conocido a una chica de otro instituto de la ciudad y llevamos unos cuántos días hablando.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Laura
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Oye, das, ya llevas una semana en el insti, ¿no? ¿Qué te va pareciendo? ¿Ya te llevas bien con alguien de clase?

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Paula
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Es que el finde que viene celebro mi cumple en mi casa y me han dicho mis padres que puedo invitaros a todos. ¿Qué os parece?

description.en-US: An identified area inside the game world. In some games they can also be worlds. Represents an aggregation of zones.

A non-interactive scene that can be skipped. A cutscene is a non-interactive scene within the game (e.g., a video, a conversation, an automated sequence). The player can usually skip them pressing some button.
A collectable game object whose use or interaction results in an effect in a game. Items are common elements in video games. Players can collect/use/combine them.

An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.

description.en-US: An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.
A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.

A game screen where a concrete game task is developed. Games are usually composed by a set of screens the player navigates. A screen has a concrete function within the game. A screen contains a menu, or the gameplay. To define virtual zones inside the game world, it is recommended to use area or zone.

A game screen where a concrete game task is developed. Games are usually composed by a set of screens the player navigates. A screen has a concrete function within the game. A screen contains a menu, or the gameplay. To define virtual zones inside the game world, it is recommended to use area or zone.
A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: A partir de ahora tendré más cuidado. Gracias mamá, gracias papá.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Por mucho que pienses que conoces a alguien, si no estás seguro al 100% de quién es, tienes que prestar atención a qué información compartes y de qué tipo.

https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.name: Papá
https://w3id.org/xapi/seriousgame/extens.text: Hoy estamos todos conectados a las redes y cualquiera puede hacerse pasar por otra persona. Por eso hay que ir con mucho más cuidado y no ir compartiendo información sensible a la ligera.

description.en-US: An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.
A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.

A game screen where a concrete game task is developed. Games are usually composed by a set of screens the player navigates. A screen has a concrete function within the game. A screen contains a menu, or the gameplay. To define virtual zones inside the game world, it is recommended to use area or zone.

description.en-US: An alternative presented during a conversation with an non-playable character. Dialog trees are a common mechanic in video games, where players can answer questions to NPC. This activity represents that type of alternative.
A accomplishable challenge or mission presented inside a game. Completing quests marks the players' progress.

A game screen where a concrete game task is developed. Games are usually composed by a set of screens the player navigates. A screen has a concrete function within the game. A screen contains a menu, or the gameplay. To define virtual zones inside the game world, it is recommended to use area or zone.
